Damon Ferrante, guitar instructor and music professor, guides you through 240 step-by-step lessons and 32 streaming video lessons that are designed to improve your guitar technique, musicality, and give your playing and songwriting more power, color and expressiveness. 

No Music Reading is Necessary! 

Used by thousands of guitarists, this book and video course will take your guitar playing to a whole new level!

If you feel that you have been locked in the same patterns and scale shapes for years, unable to break out of the dull habits and licks you first learned as a beginner, this book and video course is for you! 

You will learn how to apply the most commonly used chord, scale, and arpeggio forms in a musical manner, so that your solos, licks, and songwriting will be more creative, expressive, and colorful.


By Damon Ferrante
Published in 2012
Tags: nonfiction, music, diy, learning
MOBI, Retail, 276 pages, English
